title: A Week In The Life, Vol 24.
description: We had the fullest week ever!! And the best one! Started with pickled onions for the week. Max and Emilia both had cooking camp this week! The start of summer adventures. Fave girl! Max and Eddie went to the US open! He had a blast. I’m obsessed with him. Love! Jordy started swim lessons! Cousins!! […] The post A Week In The Life, Vol 24. appeared first on How Sweet Eats.
author: Jessica
excerpt: We had the fullest week ever!! And the best one! Started with pickled onions for the week. Max and Emilia both had cooking camp this week! The start of summer adventures. Fave girl! Max and Eddie went to the US open! He had a blast. I’m obsessed with him. Love! Jordy started swim lessons! Cousins!! […]
text: We had the fullest week ever!! And the best one! Started with pickled onions for the week. Max and Emilia both had cooking camp this week! The start of summer adventures. Fave girl! Max and Eddie went to the US open! He had a blast. I’m obsessed with him. Love! Jordy started swim lessons! Cousins!! Fave pic ever. Post swim. And then we had a birthday party!! For MONTHS all Jordan has asked for was a “head cake” – a cake with his head on it. I have NO idea where he got this. He LOVED it. It was a huge hit! How fabulously 90s birthday is this?! More cousins. And how is my baby 4?! Went mini golfing with friends for his birthday! And got ice cream! Max had a summer hockey tournament! Back in the ice rink. Friday night I went to see Thomas Rhett! It was SO good. Baby Lucy came to Max’s game. I could eat her up! So we celebrated Jordy’s birthday, father’s day and my mom’s birthday! Then today, we left for the beach! Weather is garbage, but baby BFF’s are adorable. 60 degrees, high winds, they had a blast but I was basically in a snowsuit. They don’t mind! How do I have a child that wants steak and asparagus now?! I love it!
html:
We had the fullest week ever!!

And the best one!

Started with pickled onions for the week.

Max and Emilia both had cooking camp this week!

The start of summer adventures.

Fave girl!

Max and Eddie went to the US open!

He had a blast.

I’m obsessed with him.

Love!

Jordy started swim lessons!

Cousins!! Fave pic ever.

Post swim.

And then we had a birthday party!!

For MONTHS all Jordan has asked for was a “head cake” – a cake with his head on it. I have NO idea where he got this.

He LOVED it. It was a huge hit!

How fabulously 90s birthday is this?!

More cousins.

And how is my baby 4?!

Went mini golfing with friends for his birthday!

And got ice cream!

Max had a summer hockey tournament!

Back in the ice rink.

Friday night I went to see Thomas Rhett! It was SO good.

Baby Lucy came to Max’s game.

I could eat her up!

So we celebrated Jordy’s birthday, father’s day and my mom’s birthday!

Then today, we left for the beach!

Weather is garbage, but baby BFF’s are adorable.

60 degrees, high winds, they had a blast but I was basically in a snowsuit.

They don’t mind!

How do I have a child that wants steak and asparagus now?! I love it!
